resources.string: AATMAN
1. I feel that life is very rewarding.
2. I am able to find the goodness in myself and others.
3. I am optimistic about the future.
4. I take pleasure in everyday activities.
5. I feel joy from moment to moment.
6. I have a sense of meaning and purpose in my life.
7. I have a lot of energy.
8. I feel best when I am giving to others.
9. I can find the good, even in a difficult situation.
10. I welcome and accept my feelings throughout any given day.
Always
Sometimes
Never
Your Results
We are glad to see you are happy!

You are really living a full life!
Though you probably know this already, being happy does not mean a perpetual state of bliss.
That’s just not sustainable for human nature but it does mean that you’re able to sit with all of your feelings with curiosity and compassion.
You’re able to find the goodness
in yourself and others, which
means you behave in a way that is kinder and facilitates greater happiness in your life. Keep on doing what you’re doing
and being you!
Hanging in limbo.

This isn’t a bad thing, it just reinforces that no one is happy all of the time.
And, maybe you could be doing
a bit more work to feel more
of a sense of purpose.
When you accept and embrace the tough times, you build insight and muscle for more of the happy times or periods of contentment.
You are also building empathy
for others and learning more
about how to be fully yourself.
Being more real, happy, and evolved means expanding your internal experience to include
an ever-growing awareness of all that is present.
To every dark cloud,\nthere is a silver lining.

OK, so you have some work to do, but you can easily shift your mood with a little practice.
Like all things, this phase too shall pass.
Start by accepting what you’re feeling rather than invalidating it, and embrace it with no judgement.
It might also mean there exist old wounds that need healing.
When you treat yourself with compassion and live in alignment with your values
you are better able to experience the joy of the moment and see the good in others.
Focus on gratitude, find the good in yourself and others, and create a narrative that brings meaning to your life experience.
How do you feel today?
Yay! Have a great day!!
Keep it up champ!
The day is still not over :)
Sending you a virtual hug !
Nothing is permanent,\nand that includes your hardships too!
Open
Close
